Control Name: 3.4. Ensure that shared access signature tokens expire within an hour
Control Statement: Expire shared access signature tokens within an hour. This time should be set as low as possible, and preferably no longer than an hour.

control_attributes.Control: 3.4. Ensure that shared access signature tokens expire within an hour
